name: 林信標
objective:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
schedule:
1 week Overview
2 weeks  Evolution of telecommunication technologies
5 weeks Basic concepts of telecommunications 
2 weeks Introduction to wire communications
2 weeks Introduction to wireless communication
3 weeks Future development of communication techniques
